org.esupportail.commons.services.i18n
Class BundleCachingI18nServiceImpl

java.lang.Object
  org.esupportail.commons.services.i18n.AbstractI18nService
      org.esupportail.commons.services.i18n.BundleI18nServiceImpl
          org.esupportail.commons.services.i18n.BundleCachingI18nServiceImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, I18nService, org.springframework.beans.factory.InitializingBean
public class BundleCachingI18nServiceImpl
extends BundleI18nServiceImpl

This class should be preferred to BundleI18nServiceImpl since it caches resource bundles. See /properties/i18n/i18n-example.xml.
